introduction: Software provider for energy utilities, water companies and telecommunication
title: Agility CIS - Utility Billing & CRM
description: Agility CIS provides billing and customer management solutions to the utility sector.
header_text: Millions of residential and commercial customers are billed using Agility's solutions.
Single user interface for multiple brands
Different screen layouts reflecting each brand
Tailored action scripts and workflows for each brand and product
Supports international languages and characters as well as and bi-direction writing
Input field labels and user logs are in the language selected
Reports can be published to the SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS)
browser for the entire organisation to use
Access data in familiar tools such as Excel
Slice and dice to get the insights you need

Utililise the Business Intelligence suite to ensure your data
is secure and only accesible by authorised staff.

Reporting (SSRS) browser for the entire organisation to use.
Installed on an independent web server or the Engage web server
A library of over 20 out-of-the-box web services for seamless application integration providing real time read and write access to the Engage database
In-built application level and web service level security
Flexible XML schema to allow quick configuration and customisation
User friendly dashboards to monitor and manage services
Supports international languages and characters as well as and bi-direction writing
Input field labels and user logs are in the language selected
Create and apply custom validation rules to data input
Automate recording and follow up actions
Unlimited conditional branching, guided by stored data or user input
Allows for the reuse of common routines such as capturing and validating a phone number or address
Remove guesswork of who your customers are by grouping them based on demographics and behaviour
Identify most and least profitable customer bases and targeted markets
Personalise communications by sending the right message to the right audience at the right time, improving customer retention and reducing churn

paragraph_text: Since 1998, our solutions have been helping our customers to make the most of the opportunities arising in rapidly changing, high-volume markets.
Agility CIS has specialist software solutions for energy utilities, water companies and telecommunication.
We have experience supporting all kinds of billing services in both regulated and competitive environments.

Agility understands the technical, legal and regulatory challenges that the business faces on a daily basis, and we are committed to making it easy for our customers to clear these hurdles every single day.
Our solutions support all the functions required for metered water billing.
A complete meter-to-cash solution for water utilities.
Nobody wants to receive two bills when they can receive one.  Many of our clients bill both gas and electricity on a single invoice.
At Agility we have more than ten years' experience supporting both gas and electricity suppliers. Your customer will have everything they need to know about their supply and consumption.
Our solutions support flexible pricing and billing models for telecommunications users, both for voice and data services.
Rating, billing and provisioning. Our solutions support all the necessary pricing elements.
Agility CIS offers an all-in-one solution to manage the full range utility services including electricity, gas, phone, internet and water.

Our customer information systems, include everything you'd expect of a modern software solution from customer management and market interaction to metering, billing and collections.  It also includes a range of features you may not expect designed to lower cost-to-serve and deliver a genuine competitive advantage.
Agility CIS provides cost effective billing and customer management solutions to companies on a global scale with bases from 1,000 to 1,000,000.
Contact us whenever you want, we will answer as fast as possible.
MULTIPLE BRANDS, ONE CENTRAL LOCATION
If your organisation has multiple brands, products and agents, then EngageCRM is perfect for you.
EngageCRM supports an unlimited number of brands from a single location all feeding into one application.

This means your agents can managemultiple brands and products from one central location providing each brand with a unique support
experience.
You can tailor each screen to reflect your company’s different brands and products including action scripts, workflow rules and user permissions.
SPEAKING THE SAME LANGUAGE
It’s a multi-lingual world and not everyone speaks English.
EngageCRM supports the language of your users and end-users from Arabic to Spanish.

The language dictionary is fully configurable to include localisation of culturally specific words, specialised technical terms or alternative
spellings.

WHEREVER THEY MAY ROAM
YOUR ONLINE CONTACT CENTRE
It’s quick and easy for potential customers to sign up; all they need to do is answer a few questions and they’ll be enrolled in no time.
Acquiring new customers is a costly business. Online sign up lowers customer effort and helps you stay competitive, but also reduces costs and creates efficiencies.

As a customer goes through the stages of opening an account, it will automatically generate correspondence, service orders and market switching actions based on account status, notifications received from other parties and direct user instructions.
If you're using an external sales channel, you can provide them with logins and they are ready to start selling.
No more standing in queues. Your customers can manage their accounts the easiest and quickest way, 24/7.
Your business relies on happy, satisfied customers.

My Account gives your customers instant access to a whole range of online services ranging from billing and payment history, choice of paperless or paper bills through to checking consumption, moving in/out or request a payment extention.
It can all be done online without picking up the phone.
The dashboard loads when customers log in showing customised fields such as usage summary, account details and latest transaction at a quick glance.
Manages customer preferences and keeps you up to date with their details.
Monitors and manages consumption in dollars or usage providing customers with an up-to-date look on how they are tracking.
Customers can check their current balance, compare previous bills and make secure online payments 24/7.
Existing customers can register multiple accounts for new services or services to different premises, as well as find out their next scheduled read date or enter a read themselves.
Whether the customer wants to pay their bill, move-out or tell you they’re having trouble paying, they can do it all online without picking up the phone.

Agility CIS is committed to protecting your privacy and developing technology
        that gives you the most powerful and safe online experience. This Statement of Privacy
        applies to the Agility CIS website and governs data collection and usage.
        By using the Agility CIS website, you consent to the data practices described
        in this statement.

Agility CIS collects personally identifiable information, such as your email
        address, name, home or work address or telephone number. Agility CIS also
        collects anonymous demographic information, which is not unique to you, such as
        your post/zip code, age, gender, preferences, interests and favourites.

There is also information about your computer hardware and software that is automatically
        collected by Agility CIS. This information can include: your IP address,
        browser type, domain names, access times and referring website addresses. This
        information is used by Agility CIS for the operation of the service, to
        maintain quality of the service, and to provide general statistics regarding use
        of the Agility CIS website.

Please keep in mind that if you directly disclose personally identifiable information
        or personally sensitive data through Agility CIS public message boards,
        this information may be collected and used by others. Note: Agility CIS
        does not read any of your private online communications.

Agility CIS encourages you to review the privacy statements of websites
        you choose to link to from Agility CIS so that you can understand how those
        websites collect, use and share your information. Agility CIS is not responsible
        for the privacy statements or other content on websites outside of the Agility CIS
        and Agility CIS family of websites.

Agility CIS collects and uses your personal information to operate the Agility CIS
        website and deliver the services you have requested. Agility CIS also uses
        your personally identifiable information to inform you of other products or services
        available from Agility CIS and its affiliates. Agility CIS may also
        contact you via surveys to conduct research about your opinion of current services
        or of potential new services that may be offered.

Agility CIS does not sell, rent or lease its customer lists to third parties.
        Agility CIS may, from time to time, contact you on behalf of external business
        partners about a particular offering that may be of interest to you. In those cases,
        your unique personally identifiable information (email, name, address, telephone
        number) is not transferred to the third party. In addition, Agility CIS
        may share data with trusted partners to help us perform statistical analysis, send
        you email or postal mail, provide customer support, or arrange for deliveries. All
        such third parties are prohibited from using your personal information except to
        provide these services to Agility CIS, and they are required to maintain
        the confidentiality of your information.

Agility CIS does not use or disclose sensitive personal information, such
        as race, religion, or political affiliations, without your explicit consent.

Agility CIS keeps track of the websites and pages our customers visit within
        Agility CIS, in order to determine what Agility CIS services are
        the most popular. This data is used to deliver customised content and advertising
        within Agility CIS to customers whose behavior indicates that they are interested
        in a particular subject area.

Agility CIS websites will disclose your personal information, without notice,
        only if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such action is
        necessary to: (a) conform to the edicts of the law or comply with legal process
        served on Agility CIS or the site; (b) protect and defend the rights or
        property of Agility CIS; and, (c) act under exigent circumstances to protect
        the personal safety of users of Agility CIS, or the public.

The Agility CIS website uses "cookies" to help you personalise your online
        experience. A cookie is a text file that is placed on your hard disk by a web page
        server. Cookies cannot be used to run programs or deliver viruses to your computer.
        Cookies are uniquely assigned to you, and can only be read by a web server in the
        domain that issued the cookie to you.

One of the primary purposes of cookies is to provide a convenience feature to save
        you time. The purpose of a cookie is to tell the web server that you have returned
        to a specific page. For example, if you personalize Agility CIS pages, or
        register with Agility CIS site or services, a cookie helps Agility CIS
        to recall your specific information on subsequent visits. This simplifies the process
        of recording your personal information, such as billing addresses, shipping addresses,
        and so on. When you return to the same Agility CIS website, the information
        you previously provided can be retrieved, so you can easily use the Agility CIS
        features that you customised.

You have the ability to accept or decline cookies. Most web browsers automatically
        accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser setting to decline cookies
        if you prefer. If you choose to decline cookies, you may not be able to fully experience
        the interactive features of the Agility CIS services or websites you visit.

Agility CIS secures your personal information from unauthorized access,
        use or disclosure. Agility CIS secures the personally identifiable information
        you provide on computer servers in a controlled, secure environment, protected from
        unauthorised access, use or disclosure. When personal information (such as a credit
        card number) is transmitted to other websites, it is protected through the use
        of encryption, such as the Secure Socket Layer (SSL) protocol.

Agility CIS will occasionally update this Statement of Privacy to reflect
company and customer feedback. Agility CIS encourages you to periodically 
        review this Statement to be informed of how Agility CIS is protecting your
        information.

Agility CIS welcomes your comments regarding this Statement of Privacy.
        If you believe that Agility CIS has not adhered to this Statement, please

Engage meets regulatory requirements for use in Australia and New Zealand and supports integration with market hubs and administrative structures.

MORE EFFICIENT THAN EVER BEFORE.
No one should manually run a process without good reason.
The automation module minimises resources devoted to routine manual administrative activities.
Based on your requirements, work flows can automatically generate segmented customer communications and/or internal activities.
Scheduling and queuing tasks are easily configured to run daily, weekly or monthly at set times, with exception reports automatically run and emailed to users even while you sleep.

Keeping your company strong and accelerate your management of collections, credit terms, accounts receivable tasks and increase customer satisfaction.

Engage is your complete meter-to-cash customer information system offering a suite of integrated services.

Electricity billing accounts for more than half of all our customers. We have experience supporting all kinds of billing services in both regulated and competitive environments.

At Agility, we have been working closely with electricity utilities in multiple countries for over a decade. We understand the technical, legal and regulatory challenges that businesses face on a daily basis, and we are committed to making it easy for our customers to clear these hurdles every single day.

Smart meters generate vast reams of data, which need to be stored and analysed before it can be billed. Governments are introducing new taxes, new incentives and new subsidies both for social and environmental reasons. Every market has its own unique challenges of geography and economics, and every company has its own business model. This is the sort of dynamic environment where Agility thrives.

Our low-footprint, highly-configurable design allows it to integrate into any established or new company, without restructuring the whole business around the billing software. Agility's flexible customer-focused development process allows us to support changing requirements as the market develops.
The secure industry-standard Microsoft SQL Server platform lets our customers know that they are benefiting from the best technology available.
Engage supports all the functions required for large-scale water billing.
We offer a complete solution to water utilities.

At its simplest (in a strata billing situation, for instance), water billing is very simple indeed: you just read the meter and calculate the charges.  Some strata managers use Engage in this situation, to give their customers a single unified invoice for all utilities.

However for dedicated water utilities managing supply to many industrial sites over a wide area, the story is much more complicated. Every node in the network is connected to many others, in complex ways; delivery of a high flow at one point may mean that nearby nodes get reduced usage for a time. All this needs to be planned, customers kept fully informed, and invoices at the end of the period reflect not just the volume of water used, but the demands a customer has placed on the network.
Aglity's water module tracks water transactions throughout a billing period, both from metered and unmetered consumption, and converts these to financial transactions at invoice time.
As with all our products, water can optionally be billed alongside other services on a single unified invoice.
Gas was one of the first products to be billed with Agility's systems. Today, many of our clients bill both gas and electricity on a single invoice.
At Agility we have more than ten years' experience supporting both gas and electricity suppliers. Your customers will have everything they need to know about their supply and consumption.

Gas competes with electricity as a fuel for domestic and industrial heating and cooking. Many customers use a mixture of gas and electricity in their homes or businesses, and many companies sell both fuels.

Often customers prefer to receive a single invoice for gas and electricity, and some regulators now require that metered gas consumption be converted into kWh for invoicing so that customers can compare the costs more easily. This is more easily said than done: the conversion requires not just the volume of gas metered but also its pressure, temperature and calorific value, all of which will change over time.
Agility's systems allow you to invoice multiple services even across different sites if necessary, on a single invoice giving the customer easy transparency of all their site-wide energy consumption.

Our systems support dual-fuel billing with a single invoice, converting metered volumes into kWh consumption, and all the other requirements of this demanding business. Energy values and carbon emissions can be tracked from invoice to invoice and from year to year, telling the customer everything they need to know about their supply and consumption.
Our systems support flexible pricing and billing models for telecommunications users, both for voice and data services.
Our systems interface includes a set of easy-to-manage maintenance tables allowing you to create your own price schemes and deals just by typing numbers in boxes.

As well as basic telecommunication, our systems successfully bill mobile services and data (internet) service. The highly flexible pricing model lets you decide how to market your service, what customers to target, and how to provide the services to best meet their needs.
GOES WHERE YOU GO

EngageCRM is a web-based user interface allowing access to all customer data in a handy all-in-one
format.
By simply opening your web browser, your customer data is available 24 hours a day, seven days a week.

The same security privileges apply as the Engage desktop client. Updates made in either interface are instantly
visible in the other. There’s no need to maintain parallel user identities, and the security of your customers’ private data is protected.
It’s designed for use in call centre environments, branch offices and by third party vendors.
EngageCRM users can manage customer interactions:
Anywhere where there is an internet connection
Asynchronous data access with one-click deployment
Maximise cost savings and reduced hardware and software overheads
Simple and easy to use interface
MEANINGFUL INSIGHTS
EngageBI is the reporting tool for all your raw data from the Engage or Orion system.
Using Engage BI you will enable your business to:
Create customisable reports that have meaningful insights;
analyse trends and enable informed decision making;
streamline processes to reduce costs and improve efficiency;
influence long-term management strategy and business planning;
have an increased understanding of risks and opportunities.

Users can create and schedule customisable reports without any technical knowledge with our EngageBI tool.
Get access to all your data at your fingertips. EngageBI uses the industry-leading Microsoft Business Intelligence stack.
It presents your raw data in a meaningful and insightful way using a set of industry leading tools and techniques. It’s a proven technology offering flexibility, performance and scalability.
CONNECT YOUR BUSINESS
EngageX is a powerful suite of web services used to integrate third party applications with the Engage solution.
Once installed, web service calls are made to EngageX which perform the necessary interaction with the Engage database, and returns the desired results in real time.

EngageX comes with its very own user interface to allow administrators to monitor performance, review technical documentation, provide access to third party applications and retrieve a history of transactions.
YOUR ONLINE CONTACT CENTRE
Customers today are more self-reliant than ever and demand fast convenient access to their information.
Stay connected and deliver the service your customer needs.
EngageCSS offers an integrated and personalised online experience bringing you in line with customer demands.
Not only does it lower your costs, it allows your agents to focus on more complex and value add customer interactions.

Easily accessible responsive design provides optimal viewing and interaction experience across a wide range of devices from smart phones to desktops, ready to use anywhere there is an internet connection.
Stylise, colour and set the font!
We offer three implementation options, each one designed to fit your requirements.
Option 1 - Out of the Box

Simply provide us your visual elements and brand guidelines and we’ll implement them quickly and cost effectively. It also includes favicon customisation and social widgets (Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Linkedin).
Option 2 - Your Identity
Your customer self service website can be customised to reflect your brand and identity.   We’ll work directly with a digital agency to implement your brand and structure of the site.
Option 3 - External Implementation
If you've already got a team of experts, we can supply them with all the building blocks for deployment and site build.
Increase customer loyalty, boost revenue and make smarter decisions with insights and information about your business.

You’re in control of the life cycle of the pages on your site.  By using our simple tools, your content manager or author can create, edit, publish and archive pages, reducing site maintenance costs and quick turnaround time for new or amended content.
Content managers or authors have the ability to manage the site structure, appearance of pages and navigation including:
